title: How to Total a Column on Google Sheets on PC or Mac

steps.title: Go to https://sheets.google.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://sheets.google.com in a web browser. If you're not already signed in to your Google account, follow the on-screen instructions to sign in now.

steps.title: Click the file you want to edit.
steps.content: Click the file you want to edit.

steps.title: Click the cell where you want to place the result.
steps.content: Click the cell where you want to place the result. This can be any blank cell on the sheet.

steps.title: Click Σ.
steps.content: Click Σ . It's near the top-right corner of the sheet. This opens the function menu.

steps.title: Click SUM.
steps.content: Click SUM . It's at the top of the menu.

steps.title: Select the cells you want to add.
steps.content: Select the cells you want to add. To do this, click the first cell in the column, then drag the cursor down until all cells are selected.

steps.title: Press ↵ Enter or ⏎ Return.
steps.content: Press ↵ Enter or ⏎ Return . The total of all values in the column now appears in the cell.
